text: Janmam is a Malayalam action drama film directed by Joshiy, starring Suresh Gopi, Karthika, Gopika and Samvrutha Sunil in the lead roles.and Nayanthara Played A Item Number In This Film http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/3213/malayalam/janmam/index.htmhttp://spicyonion.com/title/janmam- malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Suresh Gopi as Devaraayar * Karthika as Devaraayar's Wife * Gopika as Anthony's Wife * Samvrutha Sunil as Devarayars Sister * Nayanthara Special Appearance * Biju Menon as Anthony Raj IPS * Jagathy Sreekumar * Cochin Haneefa as Jail Suprend * Harisree Ashokan * Maniyanpilla Raju * Sudheer Karamana * Ranjith * Baburaj * Bindu Panicker * Kollam Thulasi * Shobha Mohan * Nisha Sarang Devaraayars Mother * Sadha as special appearance * Biju Pappan as Police Officer ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam- language films
